Posts.Content: Nov 5, 2009 03:16PM Margee_J wrote: Hi, I love Morristown Memorial Ripple Breast Center.  They treat the whole patient, not just the cancer, and that really makes a big difference.  Otherwise, I've heard from several Dr.s that Montclair Breast Surgery is one of the best in the area. This is the link to their site. Dr. Elliot and Dr. Holwitt's names were mentioned in particular. http://www.montclairbreastcenter.com/index.htm Since we both live so close to NYC maybe you want to go there if it's just for surgery?  I originally come from there and know a few very good Dr.s who are highly recommended.  If you'd like their names please send me a private msg. However, I should mention if radiation/chemo gets involved, I would go locally. Good Luck with whatever you choose!
